title: Color Me
lyrics:
You make me feel brand new love is colorful
(gonna be fine) Gonna be fine
Geob-i manhdeon na neul igsughan sesang-gwa
Nae ultali an-eseo beos-eonal saeng-gag-eun moshaessneunde
Eonjebuteonga us-eumyeo son naemineun

Neoleul ttala jakkuman usge doeneun na



It’s gonna be fine neowa iss-eumyeon saeng-gag-eul meomchwo

Meolis-sog-eul biwo geuligo chaewoga

Ontong saeloun geosdeullo neol dalm-eun

Mujigae saegkkallo neoleul algi jeon naneun jiwoga



Color me happy baby

Ileonjeoleon geogjeong singyeong an sseo uh nan neolo inhan jag-eun byeonhwa

Color me brightly baby

Idaelo geudaelo wanbyeoghadan mal neolo inhae alge dwaess-eo



Pyeongbeomhadeon na neul ttoggat-eun najgwa bam jeonghaejin

Seukejul sog-eseo geujeo geuleon nalo sal-assneunde

Nawan neomu daleun neolaseo eodilo twilji moleul

Neolaseo deo deo kkeullyeossneunji molla



It’s gonna be fine Oh dahaeng-iya

Niga iss-eoseo jinannal-eun ij-eo geuligo chaewoga

Ontong saeloun geosdeullo neol dalm-eun mujigae saegkkallo

Neoleul algi jeon naneun jiwoga



Color me happy baby

Ileonjeoleon geogjeong singyeong an sseo uh nan neolo inhan jag-eun byeonhwa

Color me brightly baby

Idaelo geudaelo wanbyeoghadan mal neolo inhae alge dwaess-eo



Heulishaessdeon sesang jeomjeom saeg-eul chaj-a seonmyeonghaejijanh-a pingkeubich

Chanlanhan neol dalm-a nun-i busyeo all mine nae pum-e tteol-eojin byeol



Color me happy baby

Ileonjeoleon geogjeong singyeong an sseo uh nan neolo inhan jag-eun byeonhwa

Color me brightly baby

Idaelo geudaelo wanbyeoghadan mal neolo inhae alge dwaess-eo



Yeah yeah yeah yeah woo

It’s gonna be fine alright

Yeah yeah yeah yeah woo

(You make me feel brand new love is colorful)

Neolo inhae alge dwaess-eo
